trans-unit.note: Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to add current tab to Bookmarks
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to close the current tab
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to copy the URL of the current tab to clipboard
String describing the action of opening the last added bookmark from the home screen Quick Actions via 3D Touch
String describing the action of opening the last tab sent to Firefox from the home screen Quick Actions via 3D Touch
Accessibility label, associated to the 3D Touch action on the current tab in the tab tray, used to display a larger preview of the tab.
Label for preview action on Tab Tray Tab to send the current tab to another device
'After 1 hour' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 1 minute' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 5 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 10 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
'After 15 minutes' interval item for selecting when to require passcode
Label used as a setting item and title of the following screen to change the current passcode
Title of the dialog used to request the passcode
Text displayed above the input field when changing the existing passcode
Text displayed above the input field when entering a new passcode
Text displayed above the input field when changing the existing passcode
Label for the Face ID/Passcode item in Settings
'Immediately' interval item for selecting when to require passcode

trans-unit.target: Helytelen jelkód. Próbálja meg újra (%d kísérlet maradt).
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app with attempts remaining
Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode when trying to enter a protected section of the app

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
trans-unit.source: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again in an hour.
trans-unit.target: Elérte a kísérletek maximális számát. Próbálja meg újra egy óra múlva.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: Maximum attempts reached. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Elérte a kísérletek maximális számát. Próbálja meg újra később.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user enters incorrect passcode and has reached the maximum number of attempts.

trans-unit.id: New passcode must be different than existing code.
trans-unit.source: New passcode must be different than existing code.
trans-unit.target: Az új jelkódnak különböznie kell a régitől.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed when user tries to enter the same passcode as their existing code when changing it.
Label for the Passcode item in Settings

trans-unit.target: A jelkódok nem egyeznek. Próbálja meg újra.
trans-unit.note: Error message displayed to user when their confirming passcode doesn't match the first code.
Text displayed above the input field when confirming a passcode
Text displayed in the 'Interval' section, followed by the current interval setting, e.g. 'Immediately'
Title of the dialog used to set a passcode
Label for the Touch ID/Passcode item in Settings
Label used as a setting item to turn off passcode
Label used as a setting item to turn on passcode
List section title for when to use Face ID
List section title for when to use Touch ID

trans-unit.id: Use your fingerprint to access Logins now.
trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access Logins now.
trans-unit.target: Használja az ujjlenyomatát, hogy most hozzáférjen a bejelentkezésekhez.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing logins

trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to disable Touch ID.
trans-unit.target: Használja az ujjlenyomatát a Touch ID letiltásához.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when disabling Touch ID

trans-unit.source: Use your fingerprint to access configuring your required passcode interval.
trans-unit.target: Használja az ujjlenyomatát, hogy hozzáférjen a jelkód megkövetelési időköz beállításához.
trans-unit.note: Touch ID prompt subtitle when accessing the require passcode setting
The cancel button when confirming clear history.
The confirmation button that clears history even when Sync is connected.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.
trans-unit.source: This action will clear all of your private data, including history from your synced devices.
trans-unit.target: Ez a művelet töröl minden személyes adatát, beleértve a szinkronizált eszközökön lévő előzményeket is.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear history that's synced to another device.
Settings item for clearing browsing history
Settings item for clearing the cache
Settings item for clearing cookies
Settings item for deleting downloaded files
Settings item for clearing website data
Settings item for clearing passwords and login data
The cancel button when confirming clear private data.
The button that clears private data.

trans-unit.id: This action will clear all of your private data. It cannot be undone.
trans-unit.source: This action will clear all of your private data. It cannot be undone.
trans-unit.target: Ez a művelet törli az összes személyes adatát. Vissza nem vonható.
trans-unit.note: Description of the confirmation dialog shown when a user tries to clear their private data.
Shown in error pages for files that can't be shown and need to be downloaded.
Shown in error pages on a button that will try to load the page again
Done button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Text selection menu item
Accessibility label for next result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Accessibility label for previous result button in Find in Page Toolbar.
Action button for deleting history entries in the history panel.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Ez lehetővé teszi, hogy fényképeket készítsen és töltsön fel.

trans-unit.source: Websites you visit may request your location.
trans-unit.target: A meglátogatott webhelyek kérhetik az Ön helyét.

trans-unit.source: This lets you take and upload videos.
trans-unit.target: Ez lehetővé teszi, hogy videókat készítsen és töltsön fel.

trans-unit.source: This lets you save and upload photos.
trans-unit.target: Ez lehetővé teszi, hogy fényképeket mentsen és töltsön fel.

trans-unit.note: Button for larger reader font size. Keep this extremely short! This is shown in the reader mode toolbar.
Button for smaller reader font size. Keep this extremely short! This is shown in the reader mode toolbar.

trans-unit.id: A username and password are being requested by %@.
trans-unit.source: A username and password are being requested by %@.
trans-unit.target: A következő felhasználónevet és jelszót kér: %@.
trans-unit.note: Authentication prompt message with no realm. Parameter is the hostname of the site

trans-unit.id: A username and password are being requested by %@. The site says: %@
trans-unit.source: A username and password are being requested by %1$@. The site says: %2$@
trans-unit.target: A következő felhasználónevet és jelszót kér: %1$@. Az oldal üzenete: %2$@
trans-unit.note: Authentication prompt message with a realm. First parameter is the hostname. Second is the realm string
Button for reader mode font size. Keep this extremely short! This is shown in the reader mode toolbar.
About settings section title
The title for the pinning a topsite action
The title for removing a pinned topsite action
The description of a highlight if it is a site the user has bookmarked
The description of a highlight if it is a site the user has visited

label showing how many rows of topsites are shown. %d represents a number

trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it’s already there?
trans-unit.source: Could not add page to Reading List. Maybe it’s already there?
trans-unit.target: Az oldal nem adható hozzá az olvasási listához. Lehet, hogy már rajta van?
trans-unit.note: Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after the user wanted to add current page to the Reading List and this was not done, likely because it already was in the Reading List, but perhaps also because of real failures.

trans-unit.id: Could not add page to Reading list
trans-unit.source: Could not add page to Reading list
trans-unit.target: Az oldal nem adható hozzá az olvasási listához
trans-unit.note: Accessibility message e.g. spoken by VoiceOver after adding current webpage to the Reading List failed.
Error message that is shown in settings when there was a problem loading

trans-unit.source: For iOS 13 users, Firefox now automatically switches to a dark theme when your phone is set to Dark Mode. To change this behavior, go to Settings > Theme.
trans-unit.target: Az iOS 13 felhasználók számára a Firefox most már automatikusan sötét témára vált, ha a telefon Sötét módba van állítva. A működés módosításához ugorjon a Beállítások > Téma menüponthoz.
trans-unit.note: Description for the new dark mode change in the version 22 app release. It describes the new automatic dark theme and how to change the theme settings.

trans-unit.source: Dark theme now includes a dark keyboard and dark splash screen.
trans-unit.target: A sötét téma most már sötét billentyűzetet és sötét indítási képernyőt is tartalmaz.
trans-unit.note: Title for the new dark mode change in the version 22 app release.

trans-unit.source: Built-in Enhanced Tracking Protection helps stop ads from following you around. Turn on Strict to block even more trackers, ads, and popups.
trans-unit.target: A beépített továbbfejlesztett nyomkövetés elleni védelem segít megakadályozni, hogy a hirdetések kövessék Önt. Kapcsolja be a Szigorú beállítást, hogy még több nyomkövetőt, reklámot és felugró ablakot blokkoljon.
trans-unit.note: Description for the new ETP mode i.e. standard vs strict
Text for the new ETP settings button
Title for the new ETP mode i.e. standard vs strict
See http://mzl.la/1Qtkf0j
Dark theme setting in Reading View settings
Debug option
Accessibility label for button decreasing font size in display settings of reader mode
Accessibility label for default search engine setting. Title for default search engine picker. Title for default search engine settings section.
Name for display settings button in reader mode. Display in the meaning of presentation, not monitor.
Done button on left side of the Settings view controller title bar
Used as a button label for crash dialog prompt
Panel accessibility label
The label of the button the user will press to start downloading a file
Button confirming the cancellation of the download.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to cancel this download?
trans-unit.target: Biztos, hogy megszakítja ezt a letöltést?
trans-unit.note: Alert dialog body when the user taps the cancel download icon.
Button declining the cancellation of the download.
Alert dialog title when the user taps the cancel download icon.

trans-unit.source: Downloads aren’t supported in Firefox yet.
trans-unit.target: A Firefox még nem támogatja a letöltéseket.
trans-unit.note: The message displayed to a user when they try and perform the download of an asset that Firefox cannot currently handle.
The label text in the Download Cancelled toast for showing confirmation that the download was cancelled.
The label text in the Download Failed toast for showing confirmation that the download has failed.
The button to retry a failed download from the Download Failed toast.
The button to open a new tab with the Downloads home panel
The description text in the Download progress toast for showing the number of files when multiple files are downloading.

The description text in the Download progress toast for showing the number of files (1$) and download progress (2$). This string only consists of two placeholders for purposes of displaying two other strings side-by-side where 1$ is Downloads.Toast.MultipleFiles.DescriptionText and 2$ is Downloads.Toast.Progress.DescriptionText. This string should only consist of the two placeholders side-by-side separated by a single space and 1$ should come before 2$ everywhere except for right-to-left locales.
The description text in the Download progress toast for showing the downloaded file size (1$) out of the total expected file size (2$).
Action button for deleting downloaded files in the Downloads panel.

trans-unit.source: Downloaded files will show up here.
trans-unit.target: A letöltött fájlok itt fognak megjelenni.
trans-unit.note: Title for the Downloads Panel empty state.
Action button for sharing downloaded files in the Downloads panel.
Text message in the settings table view
Label for button to perform advanced actions on the error page

trans-unit.source: Warning: we can’t confirm your connection to this website is secure.
trans-unit.target: Figyelmeztetés: nem tudjuk megerősíteni, hogy a kapcsolata biztonságos-e ezzel a weboldallal.
trans-unit.note: Warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: It may be a misconfiguration or tampering by an attacker. Proceed if you accept the potential risk.
trans-unit.target: Lehet hibás beállítás vagy egy támadó műve. Akkor haladjon tovább, ha elfogadja a lehetséges kockázatot.
trans-unit.note: Additional warning text when clicking the Advanced button on error pages

trans-unit.source: The owner of %@ has configured their website improperly. To protect your information from being stolen, Firefox has not connected to this website.
trans-unit.target: A(z) %@ tulajdonosa rosszul állította be a webhelyet. Hogy megvédje az információit az ellopásuktól, a Firefox nem kapcsolódott ehhez a webhelyhez.
trans-unit.note: Warning text on the certificate error page
Title on the certificate error page
Label for button to go back from the error page
Button label to temporarily continue to the site from the certificate error page

trans-unit.source: Open this link in the App Store?
trans-unit.target: Megnyitja ezt a hivatkozást az App Store appban?
trans-unit.note: Question shown to user when tapping a link that opens the App Store app

trans-unit.source: Open this link in external app?
trans-unit.target: Egy külső alkalmazásban nyitja meg ezt a hivatkozást?

Tile title for Facebook
Title for firefox about:home page in tab history list

Label stating your account is not verified

Button label to connect another device to Sync
Settings section title for Firefox Account
Button label to go to Firefox Account settings
Label when no internet is present
Button label to open Sync preferences

trans-unit.source: Remove the Firefox Account associated with this device to sign in as a different user.

Remove account alert is the final confirmation before user removes their firefox account

Button label to Sync your Firefox Account
Call to action for sign into sync button

Title of a notification displayed when another device has connected to FxA.

Title of a notification displayed when this device has been disconnected by another device.

trans-unit.id: Get your open tabs, bookmarks, and passwords from your other devices.
trans-unit.source: Get your open tabs, bookmarks, and passwords from your other devices.

Toggle history syncing setting
Title for button in the history panel to clear recent history
Option title to clear all browsing history.
Button to perform action to clear history for the last hour
Button to perform action to clear history for today only
Button to perform action to clear history for yesterday and today

trans-unit.source: Clearing Recent History will remove history, cookies, and other browser data.
trans-unit.target: Az előzmények törlése eltávolítja az előzményeket, sütiket és más böngészőadatokat.
trans-unit.note: Title for popup action menu to clear recent history.

trans-unit.source: Websites you’ve visited recently will show up here.
trans-unit.target: Azok a webhelyek jelennek meg itt, amelyeket nemrég látogatott meg.

trans-unit.source: Your tabs from other devices show up here.

trans-unit.source: Sign in to view a list of tabs from your other devices.

trans-unit.source: Turn on tab syncing to view a list of tabs from your other devices.

trans-unit.source: Looks like Firefox crashed previously. Would you like to restore your tabs?

Name for Mark as read button in reader mode Title for the button that marks a reading list item as read
Name for Mark as unread button in reader mode Title for the button that marks a reading list item as unread
Toast displayed to the user after a bookmark has been added.
Toast displayed to the user after adding the item to their reading list.
The title for the button that lets you copy the url from the location bar.
Toast displayed to user after copy url pressed.

trans-unit.source: Enhanced Tracking Protection is OFF for this site.
trans-unit.target: A továbbfejlesztett követés elleni védelem KI van kapcsolva ezen a webhelyen.
trans-unit.note: A switch to disable enhanced tracking protection inside the menu.

trans-unit.source: Enhanced Tracking Protection is ON for this site.
trans-unit.target: A továbbfejlesztett követés elleni védelem BE van kapcsolva ezen a webhelyen.
trans-unit.note: A switch to enable enhanced tracking protection inside the menu.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, turns on night mode.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, hides images on the webpage when pressed.
Label for title in page action menu.
The title for the button that lets you paste into the location bar
The title for the button that lets you paste and go to a URL
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to reload the current website with Tracking Protection enabled
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to reload the current website without Tracking Protection
Toast displayed to the user after a bookmark has been removed.
Toast displayed to the user after a tab has been sent successfully.
Title on tracking protection menu for blocked items.

trans-unit.source: No trackers known to Firefox were detected on this page.

trans-unit.note: Message in menu when no trackers blocked.
The title for tracking protection settings
Title on tracking protection menu showing the domain. eg. Protections for mozilla.org
The title that shows the number of content cookies blocked
The title that shows the number of social URLs blocked

trans-unit.source: Firefox is blocking parts of the page that may track your browsing.

trans-unit.note: Description of the Tracking protection menu when TP is blocking parts of the page
The description of the Tracking Protection menu item when tracking is enabled
The title that shows the number of cross-site cookies blocked
The title that shows the number of cross-site URLs blocked
The title that shows the number of cryptomining scripts blocked

trans-unit.source: Websites may load outside ads, videos, and other content that contains hidden trackers. Blocking this can make websites load faster, but some buttons, forms, and login fields, might not work.
trans-unit.target: A weboldalak külső hirdetéseket, videókat és más tartalmakat tölthetnek be, amelyek rejtett követőket is tartalmazhatnak. Ezek blokkolása a weboldalak gyorsabb betöltését eredményezheti, de egyes gombok, űrlapok és bejelentkezési mezők lehet, hogy nem fognak működni.
trans-unit.note: Description of content trackers.

trans-unit.source: These cookies follow you from site to site to gather data about what you do online. They are set by third parties such as advertisers and analytics companies.
trans-unit.target: Ezek a sütik követik Ön oldalról oldalra, és adatokat gyűjtenek az online tevékenységéről. Ezeket olyan harmadik felek állítják be, mint a hirdetők és az elemző cégek.
trans-unit.note: Description of cross-site trackers.

trans-unit.source: Cryptominers secretly use your system’s computing power to mine digital money. Cryptomining scripts drain your battery, slow down your computer, and can increase your energy bill.
trans-unit.target: A kriptobányászok titokban az Ön rendszerének erőforrásait használják digitális pénzek bányászatához. A kriptobányászok lemerítik az akkumulátort, lelassítják a számítógépét és növelhetik a villanyszámláját.
trans-unit.note: Description of cryptominers.

trans-unit.source: The settings on your browser and computer are unique. Fingerprinters collect a variety of these unique settings to create a profile of you, which can be used to track you as you browse.
trans-unit.target: A böngészője és számítógép beállításai egyediek. Az ujjlenyomat-készítők számos egyéni beállítást gyűjtenek, hogy profilt készítsenek Önről, amelyet aztán a böngészése követésére használnak.
trans-unit.note: Description of fingerprinters.

trans-unit.source: Social networks place trackers on other websites to build a more complete and targeted profile of you. Blocking these trackers reduces how much social media companies can see what do you online.
trans-unit.target: A közösségi hálózatok nyomkövetőket helyeznek le más weboldalakon, hogy teljesebb és jobban célozható profilt alkossanak Önről. E követők blokkolása csökkenti azt, hogy a közösségi médiával foglalkozó cégek mennyit látnak az online tevékenységéből.
trans-unit.note: Description of social network trackers.
The button that disabled TP for a site.

trans-unit.source: Tracking Protection is now off for this site.
trans-unit.target: A követés elleni védelem le van tiltva ezen az oldalon.
trans-unit.note: The confirmation toast once tracking protection has been disabled
A button to enable tracking protection inside the menu.
A button to enable tracking protection inside the menu.

trans-unit.source: Tracking Protection is now on for this site.
trans-unit.target: A követés elleni védelem engedélyezett ezen az oldalon.
trans-unit.note: The confirmation toast once tracking protection has been enabled
The title that shows the number of fingerprinting scripts blocked
Title for list of domains blocked by category type. eg. Blocked `CryptoMiners`
Title for list of domains blocked by category type. eg. Blocked `CryptoMiners`
Title for list of domains blocked by category type. eg. Blocked `CryptoMiners`
Title for list of domains blocked by category type. eg. Blocked `CryptoMiners`

trans-unit.source: Learn more about how Tracking Protection blocks online trackers that collect your browsing data across multiple websites.
trans-unit.target: Tudjon meg többet arról, hogy a követés elleni védelem hogyan blokkolja az online nyomkövetőket, melyek a webhelyek közti böngészési adatait gyűjtik.
trans-unit.note: more info about what tracking protection is about

trans-unit.source: No tracking elements detected on this page.

trans-unit.source: The site includes elements that may track your browsing. You have disabled protection.

trans-unit.note: label for the menu item to show when the website is whitelisted from blocking trackers.
label for the menu item that lets you remove a website from the tracking protection whitelist

trans-unit.source: If a site doesn’t work as expected, tap the shield in the address bar and turn off Enhanced Tracking Protection for that page.

trans-unit.source: You can choose which list Firefox will use to block Web elements that may track your browsing activity.

The Title on info view which shows a list of all blocked websites

trans-unit.source: Offers stronger protection, but may cause some sites to break.

trans-unit.note: Explanation of strict mode.

trans-unit.source: Reduces targeted ads and helps stop advertisers from tracking your browsing.
trans-unit.target: Csökkenti a célzott hirdetések számát, és segít megakadályozni, hogy a hirdetők nyomon kövessék az Ön böngészését.

trans-unit.source: If a site doesn’t work as expected, tap the shield in the address bar and turn off Enhanced Tracking Protection for that page.

trans-unit.note: Footer information for tracker protection level.

trans-unit.source: Allows some ad tracking so websites function properly.

trans-unit.note: Description for standard level tracker protection

trans-unit.source: Blocks more trackers, ads, and popups. Pages load faster, but some functionality may not work.
trans-unit.target: Több nyomkövetőt, reklámot és felugró ablakot blokkol. Az oldalak gyorsabban töltődnek be, de egyes funkciók lehet, hogy nem fognak működni.
trans-unit.note: Description for strict level tracker protection
Title for tracking protection options section where level can be selected.
Row in top-level of settings that gets tapped to show the tracking protection settings detail view.

trans-unit.source: Blocking trackers could impact the functionality of some websites.

trans-unit.source: Allows some trackers so websites function properly.

trans-unit.source: Blocks known trackers. Some websites may not function properly.

The Logins sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
Title for Sync status message when Sync failed to start.
Title for Sync status message when Sync failed due to being offline

trans-unit.target: A Sync problémákat tapasztal a(z) %@ szinkronizálásakor
trans-unit.note: Title for Sync status message when a component of Sync failed to complete, where %@ represents the name of the component, i.e. Sync is experiencing issues syncing Bookmarks
The Tabs sync component, used in SyncState.Partial.Title
Panel accessibility label

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the position of the single currently visible tab in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tab 2 of 5\" says that tab 2 is visible (and is the only visible tab), out of 5 tabs total.
Hardware shortcut to open the tab tray from a tab. Shown in the Discoverability overlay when the hardware Command Key is held down.
Hardware shortcut to close all tabs from the tab tray. Shown in the Discoverability overlay when the hardware Command Key is held down.
Hardware shortcut to close the selected tab from the tab tray. Shown in the Discoverability overlay when the hardware Command Key is held down.
Hardware shortcut to open a new tab from the tab tray. Shown in the Discoverability overlay when the hardware Command Key is held down.
Hardware shortcut open the selected tab from the tab tray. Shown in the Discoverability overlay when the hardware Command Key is held down.

Message spoken by VoiceOver saying the range of tabs that are currently visible in Tabs Tray, along with the total number of tabs. E.g. \"Tabs 8 to 10 of 15\" says tabs 8, 9 and 10 are visible, out of 15 tabs total.
Accessibility label for the Tabs Tray view.
The button to undo the delete all tabs
The label indicating that all the tabs were closed
The placeholder text for the tab search bar

trans-unit.id: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.
trans-unit.source: The page could not be displayed in Reader View.
trans-unit.target: A lap nem jeleníthető meg olvasó nézetben.
trans-unit.note: Message displayed when the reader mode page could not be loaded. This message will appear only when sharing to Firefox reader mode from another app.

trans-unit.id: There was a problem accessing tabs from your other devices. Try again in a few moments.

trans-unit.source: This page appears to be in %1$@. Translate to %2$@ with %3$@?
trans-unit.target: A lap nyelve ennek tűnik: %1$@. Lefordítja %2$@ra a következővel: %3$@?
trans-unit.note: Prompt for translation. The first parameter is the language the page is in. The second parameter is the name of our local language. The third is the name of the service.

trans-unit.source: Bring bookmarks, history, and passwords to Firefox on this device.

Title for the first item in the table related to syncing data (bookmarks, history) via firefox account between devices

trans-unit.source: Use any email app — not just Mail — with Firefox.
trans-unit.target: Használjon bármely e-mail appot – nem csak a Mailt – a Firefoxszal.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Mail' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the fourth panel 'Mail' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Tap the mask icon to slip into Private Browsing mode.
trans-unit.target: Érintse meg a maszk ikont, hogy privát böngészésbe váltson.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Private Browsing' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Böngésszen úgy, mintha senki sem figyelné
trans-unit.note: Title for the third panel 'Private Browsing' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Protect your logins and data everywhere you use Firefox.
trans-unit.note: Description for the third item in the table related to safe syncing with a firefox account
Title for the third item in the table related to safe syncing with a firefox account

trans-unit.source: Searching for something different? Choose another default search engine (or add your own) in Settings.
trans-unit.target: Valami mást keres? Válasszon másik alapértelmezett keresőmotort (vagy adja hozzá a sajátját) a Beállításokban.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Favorite Search Engine' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.target: Az Ön keresése, az Ön útja
trans-unit.note: Title for the second panel 'Search' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Sign in to your account to sync and access more features.
trans-unit.target: A szinkronizáláshoz és a további funkciók eléréséhez jelentkezzen be fiókjába.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Sync' panel in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Sync your bookmarks, history, and passwords to your phone.
trans-unit.target: Szinkronizálja a könyvjelzőit, előzményeit és jelszavait a telefonjára.
trans-unit.note: Title for the second panel 'Sync' in the First Run tour.

trans-unit.source: Fast, private, and on your side.
trans-unit.target: Gyors, privát és az Ön oldalán áll.
trans-unit.note: Description for the 'Welcome' panel in the First Run tour.
Title for the first panel 'Welcome' in the First Run tour.

Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to create a bookmark for the current website.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to add a page to the reading list.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to close all tabs currently open.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to copy the page url to the clipboard.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the toolbar to search for text within the current page.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Library
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open a new private tab.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open a new tab

Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Downloads home panel. Please keep as short as possible, <15 chars of space available.
Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the History home panel. Please keep as short as possible, <15 chars of space available.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to navigate to the home page.
Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Reading list home panel. Please keep as short as possible, <15 chars of space available.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Settings menu.
Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Synced Tabs home panel. Please keep as short as possible, <15 chars of space available.
Accessibility label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the Top Sites home panel.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to show the html page source
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to delete an existing bookmark for the current website.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the QR code scanner.
Label for the button, displayed in Firefox Home, used to see all Library panels.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the share dialog.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to open the tabs tray
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to translate the current page.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to request the desktop version of the current website.
Label for the button, displayed in the menu, used to request the mobile version of the current website.
A brief descriptive name for this app on this device, used for Send Tab and Synced Tabs. The first argument is the app name. The second argument is the device name.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the menu. This should match bookmarks.folder.menu.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains desktop bookmarks in the toolbar. This should match bookmarks.folder.toolbar.label on Android.
The title of the folder that contains mobile bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.mobile.label on Android.
The name of the folder that contains unsorted desktop bookmarks. This should match bookmarks.folder.unfiled.label on Android.
